thread.title: Welcome and experience at Binh duong
thread.title_full: Welcome and experience at Binh duong

author: Goviet nam-2015-10-07T11:23:22-0400
title: Welcome and experience at Binh duong
text:
Travel Articles | October 7, 2015 
All 70 rooms at this 3-star Princess Resort & Spa are tailored to satisfy guests' needs. All rooms have shower, ironing board, bathtub as well as other amenities. Other features at the Princess Resort... 
All 70 rooms at this 3-star Princess Resort & Spa are tailored to satisfy guests' needs. All rooms have shower, ironing board, bathtub as well as other amenities. Other features at the Princess Resort & Spa include safety deposit boxes, airport transfer, meeting facilities. Unwind after your day with a choice of outdoor pool, massage, sauna - just a few of the hotel's excellent sporting and leisure offerings. Guests will find this service-oriented hotel with superb facilities and amenities provides excellent value. In addition, all guestrooms feature a variety of comforts such as air conditioning, non-smoking rooms, satellite/cable TV, bathtub, desk to please even the most discerning guest. The luxury hotel offers wonderful recreational facilities such as spa, tennis courts, garden, fitness center, pool (kids) to make your stay truly unforgettable. With an ideal location and facilities to match, Saigon Park Resort hits the spot in many ways. 
Designed for both business and leisure travel, Green Eye Resort is ideally situated in Binh Duong; one of the city's most popular locales. Set 65 km from the excitement of the city, this 3-star Green Eye Resort commands an excellent location and provides access to the city's biggest attractions. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations. Green Eye Resort also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Binh Duong. Top features of the hotel include meeting facilities, coffee shop, valet parking, room service, laundry service/dry cleaning. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
